title: Match history
body: So I just played a couple of games and my match history is not updating and i dont think im getting an xp or any ip points either is anyone else having this problem or should i try re download the game???

replies.body:
Hey UGIN,

I haven't heard of anyone else having this issue. Can you confirm that you're still encountering this problem?
Think it is just related to the match history, end of games stats issues
I am also having the issue, but i am getting ip.

Hey xSCORCHEDBLADEx,

NOC posted an update about the issue a few hours ago:
>Network Operations – 4:58 AM
We are aware of issues with match history, end of games stats and Bilgewater rewards progress not working properly. We're currently investigating.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce
